title: Inquiry About Bundling Discount
description: A customer has an auto policy and is calling to see if they can get a discount by adding a renters policy.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's account.

tasks.description: Explain the multi-policy (bundling) discount and its benefits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains how the customer can save money.

tasks.description: Provide a quote for a new renters policy that includes the bundling discount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a quote for the renters policy showing the discounted price.
